snippet: Virgil Goode, of the conservative Constitution Party, qualified Tuesday for Virginia’s ballot in November, complicating Mitt Romney’s chances of winning the key swing state.
lead_paragraph: Virgil Goode, of the conservative Constitution Party, qualified Tuesday for Virginia’s ballot in November, complicating Mitt Romney’s chances of winning the key swing state.

headline.seo: Virgil Goode on Virginia Ballot Poses Worry for Romney
headline.main: Candidate on Virginia Ballot Poses Worry for Romney
headline.print_headline: Candidate on Virginia Ballot Poses Worry for Romney
